components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Receipt Delays To Globe Network in Philippines

incident_updates.body: We are still experiencing SMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to Globe network in Philippines. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery receipt delays when sending messages to Globe network in Philippines. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: 500 Errors in the Console After Completing Payments Successfully

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigate the issue with Billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through different payment methods. We expect to provide another update in 1 day or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate the issue with Billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through different payment methods. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

The previous update was sent by mistake. We are continuing to investigate the issue with Billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through PayPal payment method. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We're seeing recovery in 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through PayPal payment method. Service is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate the issue with Billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through PayPal payment method. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to investigate the issue with Billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through PayPal payment method. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through PayPal payment method. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through PayPal payment method. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating an issue with billing for a subset of customers. Customers may receive 500 errors in the Console after completing payments successfully through PayPal payment method. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with the console potentially showing 5xx errors. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, September 23rd, 2023, at 1:00 AM Pacific Daylight Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Deutsche Telekom

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Deutsche Telekom is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 24 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Deutsche Telekom customers.
Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Singapore is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 24 September 2023 at 15:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent disconnections and call failures to and from Singapore phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: New Zealand SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 24 September 2023 at 14:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from New Zealand handsets via a subset of Shortcodes.

Our SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent SMS delays delivering to and from France handsets via a subset of France longcodes.

The T-Mobile network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 September 2023 at 00:30 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 03:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon and Yota networks in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon and Yota Russia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 September 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

The Astelit network in Ukraine is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 September 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 25 September 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Astelit Ukraine handsets.

Philippines Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance Our Voice carrier partner in the Philippines is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 26 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 04 October 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilios Philippines phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

26 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 26 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT
27 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT
03 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 03 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT
04 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 04 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 September 2023 at 19:00 PDT until 26 September 2023 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 September 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 26 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilios France phone numbers.

Our Voice carrier partner in Australia is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 September 2023 at 04:00 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and call failures for calls from and to Twilio Australia phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan SMS Carrier Maintenance - KDDI Corporation

incident_updates.body: The KDDI Corporation network in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 September 2023 at 11:00 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 13:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from KDDI Corporation Japan handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partners Three UK, H3G Austria, and Wind (Tre) Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 27 September 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 27 September 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK, H3G Austria and Wind (Tre) Italy customers.

Impacted Products:

Verify Silent Network Auth - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup SIM Swap - Three UK, H3G Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy
Lookup Identity Match - Three UK, Wind (Tre) Italy

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth
